summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Terry Avenue from the south line of Terrace to the west line of Broadway and Alder Street, from the west line of Broadway to the east line of 9th Avenue and the southerly half of the intersection at 9th Avenue and Alder Street, by paving and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 46 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefore, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
